item.description:
Specific Topic:  Connecting with Your Best Self

I am so pleased to have guest speakers Ann and Mark Ide.  I have known Ann and Mark for a few years now and they are remarkable people.  Ann is a coach and instructor who uses NLP with her clients on a daily basis.  Mark and Ann together have done some remarkable things bringing the spirituality of the Law of Attraction to light.  I am sure you will enjoy this session.

 

Connecting to Your Best Self

  • Are there times when you're not feeling quite sure about yourself ,or good enough in some way for what you want?
  • Or are there times when you'd like to be prepared to be your best?
  • Would it be nice to have some easy ways to access your Best Self?

Our intention is to connect you to your inner brilliance, all the resources available to you, and the perfection that you are.  Sound good?  If so, join us, and invite your friends and family to join us, too!

Written comments after last month’s session:

"This event was phenomenal. Truly outstanding. I am SO glad I went. I left with a bunch of exciting, easy-to-apply tools for feeling better in any situation. Thanks, Ann!” Julia

"Great meditations and discussion. A very inspirational group and leader!" Kathy

Check out Ann's website at: www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com 

Contact Information:

Ann Ide
New Possibilities Coaching
Assisting you to new levels of harmony, happiness and success

AnnIde@NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com
www.NewPossibilitiesCoaching.com
508-405-1686
